name: Ruhrpott Fussball Manager
overview: A German language football management game featuring Ruhrpott area teams. The Ruhrpott is a large urban area in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. It is home to several large football clubs like FC Schalke 04, Borussia Dortmund or VfL Bochum. The two former clubs have been competing in international tournaments during the last couple of years. Borussia Dortmund was particularly successful, becoming either champions or runners-up in the Bundesliga German championship several times since 2010.
